data.text: @mckeagns Ugh no I’m so sorry Sarah that sucks ☹️☹️☹️ big time hugs your was as you deal with all the things.
@mckeagns Love and support for you all from down here, hoping and praying for your family's safety and wellbeing❤️
@mckeagns So sorry to hear - hope everything works out alright for your mum ❤
@mckeagns Sorry to hear that Saz, here if you need anything!
@mckeagns Absolutely horrible. I am so sorry that you’re stuck in this situation, and I hope that you don’t test positive. 🤞 Much love to you and yours.
@mckeagns That is not good. But so long as your mum tests negative she should be ok for chemo, I think.
